2: Hmm, it doesn't seem like anyone else will need to be served today. Perhaps I should go over everything before my first assignment...
3: Welcome to Maid Rush Madness! The goal of the game is to serve dishes to your increasingly demanding guests.
4: Ingredients for recipes will fall out of the sky. You need to move Serafina under them to catch them!
5: You can move Serafina left and right using the arrow keys.
6: You'll catch an ingredient when it falls and collides with Serafina! Your currently held ingredients can be seen on her plate.
7: Catch 3 ingredients to make a dish! There are a lot of combinations that lead to certain dishes, and some don't lead to any dishes at all...
8: When you have created a dish, it'll show up on your plate! You can't catch any more ingredients until you serve your currently held dish.
9: To serve your current dish, press the spacebar!
10: (Tip: If your plate only has ingredients and you haven't made a dish yet, you can press space to clear your plate!)
11: You need to serve dishes before time runs out! The timer at the bottom of the screen will tell you how much time you have left.
12: The timer will progressively fill as you play the game. Some guests are needier than others, meaning the timer will fill faster!
13: If the timer fills and you haven't yet completed the order, the current request will reappear to remind you of what to make! Serafina might also get a little discouraged... if she messes up too many times, she'll fail her assignment!
14: Each guest will have different dishes they'd like to be served. Make sure to remember which one to make before the request window disappears!
15: That's all for the tutorial, good luck!
